wilcoxon_signed_rank.interpretation: No significant difference in performance distributions

paired_t_test.interpretation: No significant difference in mean performance

recommendations: Focus training on underperforming vulnerability types: Unrestricted File Upload, Missing Authorization, Information Exposure
limitations: Limited training data may affect model generalization
Performance may vary on unseen programming languages
Effectiveness depends on code quality and documentation
May require domain-specific fine-tuning for specialized codebases
